title: Technical-Impact.Infer.Input
description: Profile-aware input for the Technical-Impact.Infer capability.

profile.description: Optional reference to the org or system profile to load.

profilePatch.description: Optional modifications to apply to the loaded profile.

org_ref.description: Non-PII reference to the organization whose technical impact should be inferred.

asset_names.description: List of asset names whose technical impact should be evaluated.
